bong_addbud: Adding weed buds to the bowl.
piece_bong_desc: For when you need to soar.
piece_sapling_weed_seeds_desc: Plant this to grow some seedy weed.
piece_sapling_weed_desc: Plant this to grow some weed.
item_joint_paper_desc: Use these to roll up a joint.
indica_joint_tooltip:
You feel relaxed.
Makes you Rested.

If you are already Rested, the timer will be increased by this buff's duration. This is halved if you are already high.
bong_tooltip:
You feel ZOOTED.
All three joint effects are combined.
